title: Draven Day
body:
Dear Riot,
Hello, just a quick question, I resonantly bought a legendary skin (surprise party fiddlesticks) and didn't seem to receive the draaaaven icon and am curious why I did not get it. If you could help me out that would be great. Thanks for your time, Boris.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Icons will be granted after the Draven Day Party ends on April 11 at 23:59 PST.
